name: Mangoroment
description:
Mangoroment is an action game made with the godot game engine for the cga game jam.

Controls
  • Enter: Restart game

Player 1

  • Up: Invert gravity
  • Left: Jump + shoot + move left
  • Right: Jump + shoot + move right

Player 2

  • W: Invert gravity
  • A: Jump + shoot + move left
  • D: Jump + shoot + move right
Source Code

The source code is on GitHub: https://github.com/cdqwertz/game_7
